alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 3:20PM EST until January 30 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible, especially along US-2 between Mass City and Toivola. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Ontonagon and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact the morning and evening commutes. Patchy blowing snow may sharply reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers will increase in coverage and intensity overnight, and continue into Monday afternoon. Gusty west to northwest winds up to 30 mph in open areas closer to Lake Superior and over the higher terrain will produce some blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
